Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I remember thinkin' it was weird that it
was the <clr:0000>middle of the day<clr:ffff> and not night. I
was just a baby, but I still remember it!
Talk_23: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_01>You again, huh? Are you forgetful too?
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The only other thing I recall is that it was
somewhere at <clr:0000>Lake Ferona <clr:ffff>in
<clr:0000>Eldin Canyon<clr:ffff>... But that's it.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>After retiring from the inn, I was looking
forward to takin' a trip with you at last,
just us buddies.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Here I thought Volcon and I could finally
take a vacation and go moongazing...

But we can't very well get there if neither
of us knows where it is!
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>How could I forget? It was quite a sight!
Goin' back there is a great idea.

But what with the lava flows, the area
has gotten confusing to navigate...

I don't remember where it is. I'll follow
you on this one, Volcon.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>No time like the present to take that trip.
Let's get a move on!

Time to buckle down and prepare for
the journey ahead.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Uh-oh... I was countin' on you to
remember how to get there, buddy!
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Sure thing. I just need another decade,
and then I'll be ready.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I vividly remember the <clr:0000>full moon shinin'
on the ground<clr:ffff>, but nothing aside
from that...
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I was sure you'd be the one to
remember, bud...
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>That's the Tray I know. Quick as always.


I surely won't be ready for at least
another 15 years, m'self.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>My memory is all fuzzy. Volcon, can you
remember anything else?
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If I could just see a <clr:0000>picture<clr:ffff> or something
that shows the way the <clr:0000>full moon shines
on the ground <clr:ffff>there...
Pretty sure I'd be able to remember
it then.
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's no use... Nothin' is bringin' it to mind.


Maybe if I could see a <clr:0000>picture<clr:ffff> or
something that shows that <clr:0000>full moon
shining on the ground<clr:ffff>...
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey! That's the spot! That's just how the
cave lit up when we were baby Gorons!

That did the trickâ€”I remember how to
get there.

It was on the west side of Lake Ferona!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you, young Hylian. I can remember
it so clearly now!

It was really chappin' my hide, not being
able to remember. I feel relieved to
recall it.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm sure it wasn't easy to find!


Take this as thanks from us.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Speaking of, I heard a researcher at a
place called Lookout Landing invented a
tool to turn scenery into pictures.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>Maybe I'll just stare at a map until I
remember. Or somethin'.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Scenery into pictures?! What kinda thing
can do somethin' like that?
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Well, I do remember the <clr:0000>full moon shinin'
on the ground <clr:ffff>there...<clr:0000><clr:ffff>

Other than that, I can't recall anything.
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I just heard about it. I've got no clue how
it works.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The marbled rock roast just up and
vanished...<sp:5:0:0> Sometimes the strangest
things happen.
But the city's bustlin' again, and leavin'
the work at the inn to that younger Goron
means we've got time on our hands now.
Maybe we should take a vacation, eh?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oooh, let's go somewhere we can really
see the moon.

I'm thinkin' about the place we were born,
Tray. 'Member how the <clr:0000>full moon shone
on the ground<clr:ffff> there?
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Gorons are born of the land, ya see.


Volcon and I were born from the same 
place, so you could say we're
rock brothers.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The city's all hustle and bustle again.
And the inn's all sorted out with that
young Goron.
I was thinkin' we might take a vacation
and spend time round where we were
born. Beautiful moon views and all.
But who woulda thought neither of us
would remember how to get there!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We were born in a cave.


But the full moon shone so brightly,
lighting up the darkness of the cave. It
was a mystical thing to see!
